content: step on is an easy toe-up crochet sock pattern made with simple stitches and a short row heel written in 6 sizes they are easy to adjust to fit and you can make each sock as long as you choose a free version of this pattern in adult size small is also available on the dora does website skills this is a beginner friendly sock pattern worked using mostly single_crochet uk double_crochet with half double uk half treble worked in the back loop only for the cuff you will need to work in both sides of a chain work in row and rounds pick up stitches from previous row a photo guide is included for the toe and short row heel sizing the pattern is written in size sizes from toddler uk 8-10j eu 28-30 us 10-12 to large adult uk 10-12 eu 43-45m us 12-14 with so much variation on foot size guidance is also given throughout the pattern on how to customise the fit and where to try on your sock materials the pattern is worked using a 4mm for the body and a 3 5mm hook for the toe and cuff any 4ply / sock yarn which meets gauge can be used with this pattern depending on the foot size and the length of sock you choose to work you will need between 50g / 200m and 175g / 700m for a pair the examples shown are worked in a size xs using paintbox socks in bon bon and knitcraft 2 of a kind now discontinued copyright doradoes 2020 you may sell what you make from my patterns but please credit me as the designer the pattern is for personal use only and may not be shared without written consent my photos may be shared with credit
